snippet: Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu and his defense minister, Ehud Barak, are at odds as Mr. Barak tries to turn Mr. Netanyahu’s tension with Washington to his political advantage.
abstract: Growing rift between Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu and his defense minister, Ehud Barak, centers on Israel’s strategic relations with the United States as Barak tries to turn tension between Netanyahu and Washington to his political advantage.
lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu and his defense minister, Ehud Barak, are at odds as Mr. Barak tries to turn Mr. Netanyahu’s tension with Washington to his political advantage.

headline.seo: Rift in Israel Between Netanyahu and Barak
headline.main: Rift Grows Between Israeli Leaders Over Relations With U.S.
headline.print_headline: Israeli Leaders in Tussle Over Relations With U.S.
